name: Pokemon Attack!

screenshots.caption: Pikachus running at Gyarados and attacking with Thundershock
Game Over, you let Gyarados faint!
Before the game starts, you have the field and your Gyarados

short_description:
PokemonAttack! is a Castle Defence - style game in which you have a Red Gyarados you must keep alive while Pikachus are trying to attack it. Just catch 20 Pikachus and you win!
Pokemon is Nintendo's TM not mine. I don't own the names or characters!
